pr_title: Select district IDs correctly for transactions.

timeline.message:
Select district IDs correctly for transactions.

Summary:
For NewOrder, Payment and OrderStatus transactions we are supposed to
choose a district ID that is a random number between 1 and 10.
This was not being done currently and every terminal was getting its own
unique districtID.
This commit changes this behaviour to follow the standard.

Reviewers: Neha, Karthik

timeline.bodyText: Nit: indentation seems off. Please ignore if existing code is using tabs
timeline.author: rkarthik007
